snippet: A cool spring in the Midwest has farmers eager for soils to warm up before planting what is expected to be the region’s biggest crop in decades.
abstract: Cool spring in the Midwest has farmers eager for soils to warm up before planting what is expected to be the region's biggest crop in decades.
lead_paragraph: A cool spring in the Midwest has farmers eager for soils to warm up before planting what is expected to be the region’s biggest crop in decades.

headline.main: Midwest Farmers Looking for Best Crop in Decades
